definitions.definition: a person who carries a message or is employed to carry messages.
examples: courier, runner, envoy, emissary, agent, go-between, message-bearer; Morepostman, letter carrier, mailman; historicalherald; archaiclegate "the messenger arrived by motorcycle"Morepostman, letter carrier, mailman; herald; legate the messenger arrived by motorcycle

definitions.definition: a substance that conveys information or a stimulus within the body.
an endless rope, cable, or chain used with a capstan to haul an anchor cable or to drive a powered winch.
a light line used to haul or support a larger cable.
send (a document or package) by messenger.
examples: could you have it messengered over to me?
